description:
1. I’m writing this letter to …我写信是为了…

2. I’m writing this letter with the hope of …我写信是希望…

3. I’m writing this letter to you in an effort to …我写信想要…

4. I’m sending this email to …我写这封邮件是为了…

5. Here are some suggestions I’d like to put forward…我想提如下建议

6. I want to give some opinions of myself about …我想提出我的意见

7. As a senior/fresh/student of this university, I’d like to ….作为该校大四/大一/学生，我想…

8. I do hope you can take above suggestions into consideration and thanks in advance.希望您会考虑我的建议，谢谢！

9. It is imperative/necessary that …有必要/有需要做…

10. It is widely acknowledged that …众所周知

11. It is high time that 该是…的时候了

12. It is my great pleasure to do … 我很高兴能做….

13. I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused/arising from ….我对因此带来的不便深感抱歉

14. I’m more than delighted to invite you to….我无比高兴地邀请您….

15. I would like to extend my greatest appreciation if you …..如果您能…我将感激不尽

16. Thank you for your time and consideration.感谢您花时间

17. Your prompt reply will be highly appreciated.敬盼速回，谢谢！

18. We are looking forward to your reply. 敬盼回复。

19. To apply for a position advertised on …申请刊登在…上的职位

20. To express my apology for …表达我的歉意

21. To voice my complaint/dissatisfaction about…表达我的投诉/不满

22. To convey my heartfelt congratulations to you for …表达我的衷心祝贺

23. To express my sincere gratitude to you …表达我的感激

24. To inquire about some information regarding….就…进行咨询

25. To put forward/make/offer a couple of suggestions with regard to … 提出我针对…的一些建议

26. To my surprise/dismay， 令我意外/失望的是

27. To begin with….Moreover…. 首先…其次…

28. First of all,…. Meanwhile….首先….其次

29. To be more specific…具体来说

30. On behalf of …. 我谨代表

31. In need of ... 需要

32. Major in …主修某专业

33. Outstanding academic performance 学习成绩优异

34. Take …into account/consideration 把….考虑在内

35. To spend one’s spare time 度过某人的闲暇时光

36. Highly recommend 强烈推荐

37. Be your best choice 最佳选择

38. Words cannot express how sorry/happy I was….我的担忧/喜悦无法用言语来表达

39. To broaden one’s horizon 拓宽视野

40. To enrich one’s extracurricular activities 丰富课余生活

41. To have outstanding skills at …在某方面有杰出的技能

42. To keep/bear in mind 记住

43. To exceed the limited time 超过规定期限

44. To stage a contest 举办一次比赛

45. To take tough challenge 接受严峻挑战

46. To get/be involved in = to be engaged in 参与，参加

47. In the days ahead 在未来

48. Gear up for ..为…准备

49. To call on someone to do ...呼吁某人做某事

50. To be renowned in the world for many of its ….以众多..而闻名于世
